snippet: Andrew Friedman, the Los Angeles Dodgers’ new president of baseball operations, plans to hire a new general manager and retain Mattingly as manager.
abstract: Los Angeles Dodgers new president of baseball operations Andrew Friedman says he plans to hire a new general manager and retain Don Mattingly as manager.
lead_paragraph: Andrew Friedman, the Los Angeles Dodgers’ new president of baseball operations, plans to hire a new general manager and retain Mattingly as manager.

headline.main: New Dodgers Executive Says Don Mattingly to Stay
headline.print_headline: New Dodgers Executive Says Mattingly Will Remain
